Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

enumDescriptions.Reset: The breaker is to be reset to the Normal state.

Circuit.description: This is the schema definition for an electrical circuit.
Circuit.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an electrical circuit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

BreakerState.description: The state of the over current protection device.
BreakerState.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the state of the over current protection device.

CircuitType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of circuit.

CriticalCircuit.description: Designates if this is a critical circuit or outlet.
CriticalCircuit.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate whether the circuit is desginated as a critical circuit, and therefore is excluded from autonomous logic that could affect the state of the circuit. The value shall be true if the circuit is deemed critical, and false if the circuit is not critical.

Current.description: The current sensor for this circuit.
Current.longDescription: This object shall contain the current, measured in Amperes, for this single phase circuit. This object shall not appear in resource instances representing poly-phase circuits.

EnergykWh.description: The energy sensor for this circuit.
EnergykWh.longDescription: This object shall contain the total energy, measured in kilowatt-hours (units of kilowatts), for this circuit, which represents the 'Total' ElectricalContext sensor when multiple energy sensors exist for this circuit.

Frequency.description: The frequency sensor for this circuit.
Frequency.longDescription: This property shall contain the frequency sensor for this circuit.

IndicatorLED.description: The state of the indicator LED, used to identify the circuit.
IndicatorLED.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the indicator light state for the indicator light associated with this circuit.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

NominalVoltage.description: The nominal voltage for this circuit.
NominalVoltage.longDescription: This property shall represent the nominal voltage for this circuit, in Volts.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Outlets.description: An array of references to the outlets contained by this circuit.
Outlets.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this circuit is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Outlet.

PhaseWiringType.description: The number of ungrounded current-carrying conductors (phases) and the total number of conductors (wires).
PhaseWiringType.longDescription: This property shall represent the number of ungrounded current-carrying conductors (phases) and the total number of conductors (wires).

PlugType.description: The type of plug according to NEMA, IEC, or regional standards.
PlugType.longDescription: This property shall show the type of physical plug used for this circuit, as defined by IEC, NEMA, or regional standard.

PolyPhaseCurrents.description: The current sensors for this circuit.

PolyPhaseEnergyReadings.description: The energy sensors for this circuit.

PolyPhasePowerReadings.description: The power sensors for this circuit.

PolyPhaseVoltages.description: The voltage sensors for this circuit.
PolyPhaseVoltages.longDescription: This object shall contain the voltage sensor(s) for this circuit. For single phase circuits this object will contain a duplicate copy of the voltage sensor referenced in the 'Voltage' object. For poly-phase circuits this object may contain multiple voltage sensor readings used to fully describe the circuit.

PowerCycleDelaySeconds.description: The number of seconds to delay power on after a PowerControl request to cycle power. Zero seconds indicates no delay.
PowerCycleDelaySeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of seconds to delay power on after a PowerControl request to cycle power. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power on.

PowerEnabled.description: Indicates if the circuit can be powered.
PowerEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the power enable state of the circuit.  True shall indicate that the circuit may be powered on, and false shall indicate that the circuit cannot be powered.

PowerOffDelaySeconds.description: The number of seconds to delay power off after a PowerControl request. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power off.
PowerOffDelaySeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of seconds to delay power off after a PowerControl request. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power off.

PowerOnDelaySeconds.description: The number of seconds to delay power up after a power cycle or a PowerControl request. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power up.
PowerOnDelaySeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of seconds to delay power up after a power cycle or a PowerControl request. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power up.

PowerReading.description: The power sensor for this circuit.
PowerReading.longDescription: This object shall contain the total power, measured in Watts, for this circuit, which represents the 'Total' ElectricalContext sensor when multiple power sensors exist for this circuit.

PowerRestoreDelaySeconds.description: The number of seconds to delay power on after power has been restored. Zero seconds indicates no delay.
PowerRestoreDelaySeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of seconds to delay power on after a power fault. Zero seconds indicates no delay to power on.

PowerRestorePolicy.description: The desired power state of the outlet when power is restored after a power loss.
PowerRestorePolicy.longDescription: This property shall indicate the desired PowerState of the outlet when power is applied.  A value of 'LastState' shall return the outlet to the PowerState it was in when power was lost.

PowerState.description: The power state of the circuit.
PowerState.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the power state of the circuit.

RatedCurrentAmps.description: The rated maximum current allowed for this circuit.
RatedCurrentAmps.longDescription: This property shall represent the rated maximum current for this circuit, in Amps.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Temperature.description: The temperature sensor for this circuit.
Temperature.longDescription: This object shall contain the temperature sensor for this circuit.

Voltage.description: The voltage sensor for this single phase circuit.
Voltage.longDescription: This object shall contain the voltage, measured in Volts, for this single phase circuit. This object shall not appear in resource instances representing poly-phase circuits.

VoltageType.description: The type of voltage applied to the circuit.
VoltageType.longDescription: This property shall show the type of voltage applied to the circuit.

enumDescriptions.Mains: A mains input or utility circuit.

Currents.description: This object contains the current sensors.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1.description: The current sensor for this circuit.

Line2.description: The current sensor for this circuit.

Line3.description: The current sensor for this circuit.

Neutral.description: The current sensor for this circuit.

EnergyReadings.description: This object contains the energy sensors.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The energy sensor for this circuit.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The energy sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToLine3.description: The Energy sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The energy sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToLine1.description: The Energy sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The energy sensor for this circuit.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BranchCircuit.description: A reference to the branch circuit related to this circuit.
BranchCircuit.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the branch circuit resource that this circuit is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Circuit.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

enumDescriptions.ACandDCWideRange: Wide range AC or DC input.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumLongDescriptions.OnePhase3Wire: This property shall represent a 1-Phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Neutral, Protective Earth)  wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.ThreePhase4Wire: This property shall represent a 3-Phase / 4-Wire (Line1, Line2, Line3, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.ThreePhase5Wire: This property shall represent a 3-Phase / 5-Wire (Line1, Line2, Line3, Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.TwoPhase3Wire: This property shall represent a 2-Phase / 3-Wire (Line1, Line2, Protective Earth) wiring.
enumLongDescriptions.TwoPhase4Wire: This property shall represent a 2-Phase / 4-Wire (Line1, Line2, Neutral, Protective Earth) wiring.

enumLongDescriptions.California_CS8265: This plug shall match the 'California Standard' CS8265 style plug (Three-phase 250V; 50A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.California_CS8365: This plug shall match the 'California Standard' CS8365 style plug (Three-phase 250V; 50A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.Field_208V_3P4W_60A: This field-wired input is three-phase 200-250V; 60A; 3P4W.  It is appropriate for use on a 60A branch circuit.
enumLongDescriptions.Field_400V_3P5W_32A: This field-wired input is three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 32A; 3P5W.  It is appropriate for use on a 30, 32A, or 40A branch circuit.
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_1P3W_16A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 316P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 16A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_1P3W_32A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 332P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 32A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_1P3W_63A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 363P6 plug (Single-phase 200-250V; 63A; 1P3W; Blue, 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_3P4W_60A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 460P9 plug (Three-phase 200-250V; 60A; 3P4W; Blue; 9-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_3P5W_16A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 516P6 plug (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 16A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_3P5W_32A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 plug 532P6 (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 32A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_3P5W_60A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 plug 560P9 (Three-phase 120-144/208-250V; 60A; 3P5W; Blue; 9-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60309_3P5W_63A: This plug shall match the IEC 60309 563P6 plug (Three-phase 200-240/346-415V; 63A; 3P5W; Red; 6-hour).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60320_C14: This input shall match the IEC 60320 specified C14 input (Single-phase 250V; 10A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.IEC_60320_C20: This input shall match the IEC 60320 specified C20 input (Single-phase 250V; 16A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_5_15P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified 5-15 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 125V; 15A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_5_20P: This plug shall match The NEMA specified 5-20 straight (non-locking) plug that exhibits a T-slot (120V; 16A).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_6_15P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified 6-15 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 250V; 15A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_6_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified 6-20 straight (non-locking) plug (Single-phase 250V; 20A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L14_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L14-20 plug (Split-phase 125/250V; 20A; 2P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L14_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L14-30 plug (Split-phase 125/250V; 30A; 2P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L15_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L15-20 plug (Three-phase 250V; 20A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L15_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L15-30 plug (Three-phase 250V; 30A; 3P4W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L21_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L21-20 plug (Three-phase 120/208V; 20A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L21_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L21-30 plug (Three-phase 120/208V; 30A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L22_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L22-20 plug (Three-phase 277/480V; 20A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L22_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L22-30 plug (Three-phase 277/480V; 30A; 3P5W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_15P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L5-15 plug (Single-phase 125V; 15A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L5-20 plug (Single-phase 125V; 20A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L5_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L5-30 plug (Single-phase 125V; 30A; 1P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_15P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L6-15 plug (Single-phase 250V; 15A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_20P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L6-20 plug (Single-phase 250V; 20A; 2P3W).
enumLongDescriptions.NEMA_L6_30P: This plug shall match the NEMA specified locking L6-30 plug (Single-phase 250V; 30A; 2P3W).

PowerControl.description: This action is used to turn the circuit on or off.

PowerState.description: The desired power state of the circuit.
PowerState.longDescription: This parameter shall define the desired power state of the circuit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerReadings.description: This object contains the power sensors.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The power sensor for this circuit.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The Power sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToLine3.description: The Power sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The Power sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToLine1.description: The Power sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The Power sensor for this circuit.

PowerRestorePolicyTypes.description: The enumerations of PowerRestorePolicyTypes specify the choice of power state for the outlet when power is applied.

enumDescriptions.AlwaysOff: The outlet will always remain powered off when power is applied.
enumDescriptions.AlwaysOn: The outlet will always power on when power is applied.
enumDescriptions.LastState: The outlet will return to its last power state (on or off) when power is applied.

enumDescriptions.Off: The circuit or outlet is powered off.
enumDescriptions.On: The circuit or outlet is powered on.

ResetBreaker.description: This action is used to attempt to reset the circuit breaker.

PowerState.description: The desired power state of the circuit if the breaker is reset successfully.
PowerState.longDescription: This parameter shall define the desired power state of the circuit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetStatistics.description: This action is used to reset statistics related to this circuit.
ResetStatistics.longDescription: This action shall perform a reset of any time intervals or counted values for this circuit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Voltages.longDescription: This object shall contain the voltage sensor(s) for this circuit. For single phase circuits this object will contain a duplicate copy of the voltage sensor referenced in the 'Voltage' object. For poly-phase circuits this object may contain multiple voltage sensor readings used to fully describe the circuit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Line1ToLine2.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

Line1ToNeutral.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToLine3.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

Line2ToNeutral.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToLine1.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

Line3ToNeutral.description: The voltage sensor for this circuit.

title: #Circuit.v0_9_0.Circuit
